A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very disappointed in the movie. Rian Johnson did a terrible job. I hope J.J. can fix the steaming pile of crap he was left with. This was my least favorite Star Wars film. There was no real plot; it was filled with 5 second cheap laughs. The only reason I gave this two stars is because there are three scenes in the entire film that are true Star Wars and not this load of crap Disney is turning it into.
